gluttony.question: Have I taken more than my fair share in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
through conversations at social events or online forums related to shared interests
at social events or online forums related to shared interests
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations at social events or online forums related to shared interests?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking about others ' personal lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in speaking about others' personal lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing private matters, even if true, that were shared about friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
